Articles.Content:
So i was bored one day, and came up with this beast ( probably not a beast )

Not made for bumps

Well, back to the subject, i made this thing (if it's even that) called The Titan Transporter

No clue what use it has, except transporting big stuff

Mediafire download: http://www./download/6d15f9685u8rmvo/Titan_Transporter.rar

Tell me your thought's and stuff

EDIT: 1 to activate some wheels locking

Tobbzzzz, 1st Machine Crafter

Edited October 14, 2013 by Tobbzzzz
.... Hmmmmmmm *processing I don't know what to make of this!
I'd like to see this giant in action! Can we have a video or something?
Slap some docking ports on it and and have it carry something, either a VTOL or have another vtol place a craft

It's like a mobile runway...

Also if you added some sort of winch from KAS you could make it actually able to take stuff, the usefulness in that? None but whatever.

Aircraft carrier

Able to take off a VTOL or even a normal plane off of its deck and able to land a VTOL or a normal plane (Drogue chute?) on it.

You should also make a small ramp on the end of the carrier so it would get a slight lift so it doesn't crash into the ocean
It's like a giant rug with wheels...
Thanks for all the feedback guys! i got an new idea, so keep checked.

Edit: I just built my own as part of the craft. Thanks for the idea though.

I'm trying to use this, but for the life of me I can't turn it into a subassembly. No matter what part I pick/add, it tells me the selected part is not attachable. Do you have the same issue? If you don't, could you upload a subassembly version for me?

Edited November 1, 2013 by ScottyDoesKnow
